title: Executive Order 5676-Modification of Reservoir-Site Reserve No. 1, Wenatchee Lake Reservoir, Washington
content: The Executive order of January 17, 1911, creating Reservoir-Site Reserve No. 1, is hereby modified to the extent of authorizing the Federal Power Commission to issue a license for Project No. 1150 on the following-described lands:
T. 26 N., R. 17 E., sec. 8, E ½ SW. ¼ SW. ¼ SE. ¼;
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5676-Modification of Reservoir-Site Reserve No. 1, Wenatchee Lake Reservoir, Washington Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361381
